subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Boston starter Josh Beckett fell one out short of a shutout yesterday, but he still became the first major league pitcher to reach 15 wins this season, as the Boston Red Sox defeated the Baltimore Orioles, 6-2.
snippet: Boston starter Josh Beckett fell one out short of a shutout yesterday, but he still became the first major league pitcher to reach 15 wins this season, as the Boston Red Sox defeated the Baltimore Orioles, 6-2.
